root: ^now, their hands are on mine. Every touch burns me from inside…
^their heavy breath seems just near my ears
^they are staring at me with slight smile
^*Sim gently leads your hands to cover his chest*
^their skin feels cold. But when they get close to me, my burning gets cooler.
^wanna feels it again…I cannot help it
^I am losing control. Is this the lust that I have?
^See, his hesitated eyes. His healthy body. So delicious…
^what is this lust for? Why does this desire emerge so strongly?
^*Sim reaches out arm to hold your back*
^“...Making you inside of me or me inside of you.”
